name: Auto-Layout Kanban Board
description:
In this file you'll be able to:

- Drag and drop task cards to different columns
- Duplicate cards in a list
- Change the details of any card
- Remove the details of a single card or across all cards

Here is the full video tutorial on how to recreate it from scratch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ez0vaBaLiU&lc=UgyJTutc4ZERR2aH8p14AaABAg
